price: Ɛda a (wͻn a wͻnnye nnie no) bɛhunu (saa Da) no no, εbεyε wͻn sε anyumerε mu anaa anͻpa mu berε tiaa bi na wͻde tenaa (wiaseε).
arabic: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ka-annahum yawma yarawnahā lam yalbathū illā ʿashiyyatan aw ḍuḥāhā
